sneakers.name: Air Max 270
sneakers.description: Your perfect sneakers for everyday use. Lightweight sneakers for trips or casual outings.  Drip and slay like a queen with the Air Max 270 Sneakers. It blends with all environments and available for women of all sizes.

sneakers.description: Your perfect unisex sneakers for everyday use. Lightweight sneakers for trips or casual outings. Drip is eternal so don the Chuck 7- Vintage Canvas with confidence to your next outing with your friends. It is available in varying sizes for all gender.
